LIBFLIAPI FLISetFrameType

(flidev_t dev, fliframe_t frametype)

Set the frame type for a given camera.

Documentation

Set the frame type for a given camera. This function sets the frame type for camera dev to frametype. The frametype parameter is either FLI_FRAME_TYPE_NORMAL for a normal frame where the shutter opens or FLI_FRAME_TYPE_DARK for a dark frame where the shutter remains closed.
Parameters:
cam - Camera to set the frame type of.
frametype - Frame type: FLI_FRAME_TYPE_NORMAL or FLI_FRAME_TYPE_DARK.
Returns:
Zero on success.
Non-zero on failure.
See Also:
fliframe_t
FLIExposeFrame
